00053 template <typename TReal> class aiVector3t;
00054 template <typename TReal> class aiMatrix3x3t;

00056 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 template <typename TReal>
00059 class aiQuaterniont
00060 {
00061 public:
00062     aiQuaterniont() : w(1.0), x(), y(), z() {}
00063     aiQuaterniont(TReal pw, TReal px, TReal py, TReal pz)
00064         : w(pw), x(px), y(py), z(pz) {}
00065 
00067     explicit aiQuaterniont( const aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& pRotMatrix);
00068 
00070     aiQuaterniont( TReal rotx, TReal roty, TReal rotz);
00071 
00073     aiQuaterniont( aiVector3t<TReal> axis, TReal angle);
00074 
00076     explicit aiQuaterniont( aiVector3t<TReal> normalized);
00077 
00079     aiMatrix3x3t<TReal> GetMatrix() const;
00080 
00081 public:
00082 
00083     bool operator== (const aiQuaterniont& o) const;
00084     bool operator!= (const aiQuaterniont& o) const;
00085 
00086     bool Equal(const aiQuaterniont& o, TReal epsilon = 1e-6) const;
00087 
00088 public:
00089 
00091     aiQuaterniont& Normalize();
00092 
00094     aiQuaterniont& Conjugate ();
00095 
00097     aiVector3t<TReal> Rotate (const aiVector3t<TReal>& in);
00098 
00100     aiQuaterniont operator* (const aiQuaterniont& two) const;
00101 
00102 public:
00103 
00110     static void Interpolate( aiQuaterniont& pOut, const aiQuaterniont& pStart,
00111         const aiQuaterniont& pEnd, TReal pFactor);
00112 
00113 public:
00114 
00116     TReal w, x, y, z;
00117 } ;

00119 typedef aiQuaterniont<ai_real> aiQuaternion;
